entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 11 with temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon.
